html:
Account

The other party of the contract. Required.

Account's banking details

Select data from the Banking details expanded list of the selected account. The field unlocks once you fill out the account.

Our company

The account that represents your party in the contract. You can select from accounts of the "Our company" type. Required.

Our banking details

Select data from the banking details specified on your company page. The field unlocks once you fill out the Our company field.

Amount

Select those ordered products you need to connect to the contract.

Order

Select order linked to the contract.
